author: jacopoc
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1677597

Removed commons-cli jar that was not used: barcode4j has an optional dependency on it but only if used from the command line (which is not the case in OFBiz); Groovy has a dependency on Commons CLI, antlr, asm  but it uses a copy of them bundled in groovy-all jar, so removing the pathelements set for the ant path id "groovy.class.path".
